title: TechFest
description: Annual technology festival showcasing innovations, robotics competitions, and coding challenges. Features industry experts and workshops.

title: Hackathon
description: 24-hour coding marathon where students develop solutions to real-world problems. Sponsored by leading tech companies.

title: Annual Day
description: A grand celebration of talent with performances, awards, and cultural showcases. The most anticipated event of the year.

title: Inter-college Sports Meet
description: Annual sports championship featuring various indoor and outdoor games with teams from colleges across the region.

title: Music Nights
description: Musical performances festival featuring classical, contemporary, and fusion music from talented students and guest artists.

title: Alumni Meet
description: Annual alumni gathering bringing together past students to share experiences and network with current students.
